blog:item.title: New DeeEnEs version 2.3.30
blog:item.blog:content: Uploaded a new version of DeeEnEs (2.3.30) which fixes a minor problem with the tray icon status. It would continuously flash red after indicating an error if it was not able to contact the server even if it happened only once. It will now show the offline status icon like it should. I also fixed the URL that was opened when choosing Help from the pop-up menu (thanks to all those people that pointed that one out to me).
